column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The best ramen noodle
column2: that's what my son said.  I surely agreed with him.   We ordered black ramen. The gyoza not bad
column3: a bit oily.   The seaweed salad was so so.  Wish they put more of the seaweed salad more than the rest of the vege
column4: because after all it's a seaweed salad.
